SummaryEnglish: Theyâ€™re robots that can transform into cars -- and the Tobots are committed to fighting villains to protect the city and root out crime.

1.SummaryEnglish: Ryan and Kory return home from school in their father's car, when suddenly a black van appears and snatches Franklin. As the twins panic, their father's car transforms and chases the black van. Ryan and Kory learn their car, Tobot X, was made by their father to protect them. Rather than asking the police for help, Ryan and Kory decide to look for him themselves.

2.SummaryEnglish: Dolly now knows the truth behind Ryan and Kory's Tobots. She decides to join their team. In fact, she tries to LEAD them. Remembering Franklin's warnings about the malfunctioning cars, Ryan and Kory decide to investigate thinking it will bring them closer to finding their father. Dolly tries to get help from other classmates but suddenly a malfunctioning school bus puts the kids in trouble.

3.SummaryEnglish: Behind the villainous Diluk, there's Limo, the CEO of Booroong Motors. Understanding the true identity of the Tobot, Limo orders Diluk to lure Tobot X into chasing the black van. Having lead Tobot X into a deserted area, the black van suddenly transforms into yet another giant robot! Help, Tobot X is in trouble!

4.SummaryEnglish: Limo realizes that his old friend Franklin was captured by Diluk and goes to his headquarters. Because of all the car malfunctions, people have started to look for trusty Booroong cars. Officer Oh wants to pursue the malfunctioning car mystery but is unable to because her chief wants her to compete in a dance-off. She takes the previously collected SlugBot to search for the kids.

5.SummaryEnglish: Franklin returns home with his two sons. Once he returns, he is shocked to see what a mess it is. The family decides to clean it together. Meanwhile, Diluk has returned from Limo's office to find a message from a mysterious woman named Acnee. She offers a large sum for the rights of Tobot Zero's artificial intelligence. She gives him a month's time to prepare and an army of Bikerbots to help.

6.SummaryEnglish: Acnee's new weapon is called the Acbot. In order to control this robot, Diluk needs to read a thick instruction manual. Dolly pleads with the twins to bring the robots to school, but the boys refuse. The next day, the kids surround and make fun of Dolly for being a liar for saying that she knows where the Tobots live, when Tobot X and Tobot Y appear.

7.SummaryEnglish: The Acbot requires a lot of energy to charge which causes Diluk to freak out as he's almost bankrupt from paying electric bills. Diluk asks the Bikerbots to find a way to make more money. He also considers working at a chicken store when he bumps into the twins. They are so busy arguing that they don't see the Tobots being towed for a parking violation.

8.SummaryEnglish: Having lost their Tobots, the twins are furious. The two feel useless without them. While the boys work out their differences, Dolly realizes the comments on the fan site were created by Diluk! After more investigating, Dolly finds Diluk's quarters and the twins set off to reclaim their Tobots.

9.SummaryEnglish: Ryan and Kory see Dylan at a mart as he catches a thief by tripping him. They are amused by this quiet boy. Franklin decides to take Dylan under his wing, and the twins are surprised to see the same boy from the mart inside their home. Meanwhile, as Diluk is being transported to jail, he is able to escape with Acnee's help.

10.SummaryEnglish: Dolly sees Dylan and Diluk together and tells Ryan and Kory who realize that their suspicions were right! Dylan is Diluk's spy. Meanwhile, in order to sway Dylan, Diluk lies that Limo is in jail because Franklin framed him.

11.SummaryEnglish: Because the clouds have fully taken over the sun, the Tobots are unable to complete the charge. Diluk is delighted by these advancements. Without the sun the Tobots are unable to recharge! Diluk plans on exhausting all of the Tobots' energy by releasing the Bikerbots.

12.SummaryEnglish: After chased by the Bikerbots, Dylan suffers an injury. Officer Oh discovers Dylan and takes him back to Franklin. Ryan and Kory are surprised when they find out that Limo made artificial limbs for Dylan after he suffered an accident. Franklin helps to fix Dylan's limbs, and he leaves for Diluk's quarters to find Z so that he can help X and Y.

13.SummaryEnglish: The Tobots are so popular that they now have their own musical. Ryan and Kory are dying to tell everyone that they are the pilots, but Dylan is not as willing. Timmy's a huge Tobot fan and believes his older brother, Nathan, is also a Tobot pilot.

14.SummaryEnglish: Ryan, Kory, and Dylan are upset when they read the article that claims Nathan is the true Tobot pilot and decide to confront him at the junkyard. Nathan and Timmy slip past the crowd of reporters that have appeared at school and return home where they meet the twins and Dylan. Acnee discovers that Nathan is a computer genius and orders Diluk to use the boy to revenge the Tobot pilots.

15.SummaryEnglish: Diluk is at the bank with a drilling machine when the Tobots arrive! They start fighting but suddenly the Tobots show strange behavior caused by the virus.

16.SummaryEnglish: Nathan shows Timmy clips of the Tobot causing trouble in the city. Nathan is surprised to see his brother is sad. In tears, Timmy explains that he doesn't care if the Tobots are heroes, but he cares because they're his friends! At the police station, Officer Oh persuades Franklin to reveal the truth behind the pilots. Realizing why Nathan had to lie to Timmy about Zaritan, Kory is further humbled.

17.SummaryEnglish: Since the villains are less active, the kids are feeling restless. Franklin suggests that they begin community service. The Tobots assist the inhabitants in directing traffic among other things. Meanwhile, Professor Noh steals a powerful device he invented called the Corona Lens but it falls into a manhole.

18.SummaryEnglish: While Professor Noh waits for his Puppybot to return with Franklin, Diluk randomly drops his snack into the very hole that Professor Noh is trapped in! He races to Acnee to tell her of the news, who then releases her Seekerbots.

19.SummaryEnglish: Professor Noh explains the power of the Corona Lens. Ryan, Kory, and Dylan realize that the Lens could destroy the Tobots, and decide that they need to find it before Acnee does.

20.SummaryEnglish: Now that the Cyclops has secured the lens it's able to shoot beams. Tritan narrowly dodges the attack and its ear is badly damaged. The kids are afraid and run away. Acnee orders the Cyclops retreat and she sets out to look for Diluk and the Bikerbots.

21.SummaryEnglish: Once again, the city is in an uproar with the arrival of a cat-shaped UFO. Franklin and Professor Noh are proud that Tobot X and Y are ready to take off!

22.SummaryEnglish: It's summer vacation and all the kids want to do is play games. Franklin scolds the boys for wasting their time so the they begin to work on their bean growing kit. Kory and Dylan have been spying on Neon and Dolly tells them that everyone is talking about the Red Rider! The kids are convinced that Neon is the Red Rider, and begin to collect evidence to prove it.

23.SummaryEnglish: As Kory stands up against the Rockinbot, Diluk suddenly appears in a self-made hero costume and calls himself the Blue Rider. Diluk mistakenly presses the Turbo-booster button and sends his bike flying into Rockinbot's head, bringing Neon to the ground with it.

24.SummaryEnglish: Under the guidance of the twins, Neon begins to work on aligning his voice with Tobot X and Y's Smart Keys. Acnee orders Neon to bring her the Tobots but Neon resists, telling her that he cannot betray his friends.

25.SummaryEnglish: Diluk breaks into Nathan's junkyard and plans to steal all the car scraps. The Tobots have been placed in the junkyard to lure Diluk and to save Nathan.

26.SummaryEnglish: There is a flurry of activity as the Spy Flies try to spy on the kids and their construction of the new Tobot. As Acnee monitors the activity, she suddenly thinks back to the time when she participated in a robot competition.

27.SummaryEnglish: Due to Officer Oh's recent success in fighting the Stinkerbot, she ranks number one on the Tobot W pilot contest. Diluk tries to get his own dose of winning, by attacking the police office using the Stinkerbot attack.

28.SummaryEnglish: Successful in distracting the Tobots, Acnee heads to the garage that houses their secret. The Tobots initiate the Tritan transformation to fight against the Raptorbot. The Raptorbot has new capabilities that the Tobot team were not ready for, and the fight is a struggle.

1.SummaryEnglish: After seeing the destruction the Raptorbots are capable of, Ryan, Kory, Dylan, and Nathan decide to practice. Acnee, who has been monitoring their progress with the Spy Fly, only snickers. She still doesn't know what the true secret of the Mind Core is, and though she has a huge fleet of Raptorbots, she realizes she needs more information.

2.SummaryEnglish: Ryan and Kory hear that the robot competition is currently being held in Daedo City, and they decide to check it out. It turns out that this competition was only a ploy created by Acnee so that she could "run into" the Tobot pilots. Dressed in regular clothes, she pretends to ask them for directions, and they walk along together until, as per Acnee's instructions, Diluk pretends to attack her.

3.SummaryEnglish: Diluk pulls up at Daedo Mart to cause trouble, backed by his Bikerbots and all decked out in his motion-capture gear to better control the Raptorbots. The Tobots and their pilots work together to bring the Raptorbots down to the ground.

4.SummaryEnglish: The construction of Trytan II and the new larger underground Tobot base are well underway. Acnee hoodwinks Tobots X and Y into thinking that Ryan and Kory are now more interested in Trytan II and have forgotten about their own Tobots. Meanwhile, Dolly and Nathan bury themselves in investigation and find that Acnee has been missing from her headquarters.

5.SummaryEnglish: Acnee has left victorious, and Franklin and the twins do their best to recover. Suddenly, a multitude of Raptorbots and dice appear all over the city, and nobody knows what they're for. The Tobot team is aware that Acnee is planning something ruthless, but since Ryan and Kory don't have their Tobots, all they can do is worry.

6.SummaryEnglish: Since Diluk has disrupted Acnee's plans with the Raptorbots, she prohibits his use of the machines indefinitely. Luckily, she does not know yet that X and Y have escaped, but fearing that it's only a matter of time until she finds out, Diluk heads for the Tobot HQ to at least appear busy. After hearing the twins' complaints, X and Y completely lose their confidence and blame themselves further.

7.SummaryEnglish: Just as X, Y, Z and W attempt to move one of the dice, they face the Raptorbots' attacks. But the team takes the Raptorbots by surprise using their Joint Attack. Acnee, now aboard Trytan II, watches as the Raptorbots put the last die in place, and then she launches her own attack. In the meantime, Franklin and Limo learn about the true nature of the dice.

8.SummaryEnglish: Tyrant II brings together all the dice to further deepen the fear that shrouds Daedo City. The city needs their guardians more than ever, but the twins and their Tobots are still feeling down, and are in no shape to help. X and Y confess that they would rather become mindless robots than become unfit to protect their pilots.

9.SummaryEnglish: A small hole-in-the-wall noodle restaurant is filled to the brim with customers. There are people waiting outside to get a taste of this famous recipe. A lone man weaves his way swiftly through the hordes and seats himself in a narrow corner of the shop. After a taste, he makes quick jots on his smart phone device, then leaves just as quickly as he had come.

10.SummaryEnglish: The kids run into Officer Oh, and they start to talk about the fire at Grandma's Original noodle shop. Officer Oh and the Daedo police force are stumped as to the culprit, and continue their investigation. Diluk enters a famous noodle shop wearing sunglasses, and after eating a large serving of noodles, leaves a cell phone behind.

11.SummaryEnglish: The kids are disappointed that all their favorite noodle restaurants in the city have closed down. They discover a small shop next to the village bus stop and decide to try out their noodles. The shop owner introduces herself, and it turns out she's an amazing cook.

13.SummaryEnglish: Everyone in Daedo City is talking about Tom Fuse, who stars in a hit TV show and many popular movies. Dolly, Officer Oh, Layla, and even Mrs. Park are huge fans of his, but the boys don't understand why everyone likes him. After some consideration, Franklin and Limo decide that the Tobot team would work most efficiently if split into two groups.

14.SummaryEnglish: Officer Oh and Tobot C are in hot pursuit of the fake cops in their black van, and they decide they need backup. Officer Oh calls the Dream Team for help, but Ryan, who's in the shower, is unable to hear his Smart Key ringing. Kory, however, takes the call and heads off to beat his brother to the chase.

15.SummaryEnglish: Ryan and Kory are obsessed with competing against each other. All day long they stare at their Smart Keys, ready at any minute for a call from Officer Oh. Meanwhile, Officer Oh uses clues from the CCTV recordings and goes out to investigate the car wash where the fake officers' black van was last seen.

16.SummaryEnglish: While the Food by Fuse launch festivities continue, Officer Oh goes over to get a closer look at the black van with Ryan, Kory, Dylan and Nathan. Just as they're questioning whether this is the fake cops' van, a man climbs into the driver's seat, and his flashy watch catches Officer Oh's eye.

17.SummaryEnglish: Food by Fuse is opening its 200th store, and as a special opening event, Tom Fuse is slated to appear for an autograph signing. Dolly makes a gift for Tom Fuse to give to him at the signing. When she gets there, however, she spots a lady protesting just outside the restaurant.

18.SummaryEnglish: In order to alert people of the effect Food by Fuse has on small businesses, and to tell Mrs. Hall's story, Dolly requests that Kory post an article about it on his Soccer News site. Kory rejects her proposal. Dolly realizes that she can work without Kory and makes her own online news site.

19.SummaryEnglish: Feeling guilty about the fake acting academy site, Diluk takes the lead in the search for Dolly in hopes of atonement. Kory learns about Dolly's recent success with her new site, and decides to start his own general news site to top her.

20.SummaryEnglish: Tobot R rescues a protestor from the mysterious squid-bot tentacles. Dolly passes Norman on the street, but is surprised to see that he isn't with his mother. Norman tells Dolly that his mother went missing that morning.

21.SummaryEnglish: Tobot R appears to help Daedo City's firefighters put out the fire at Food by Fuse. Meanwhile, when Norman sees that Dolly pays more attention to D's Mind Core than to him, he begins to feel jealous.

22.SummaryEnglish: Dolly goes out in search of Norman. Although Tobot D's rehabilitation is not yet complete, D decides to accompany Dolly in her search. Diluk shows Tom Fuse and Mr. Holmes some special techniques for brainwashing the Food by Fuse "taste-testers" into loving the food.

23.SummaryEnglish: Unable to transform without Dylan, Z helps protect Ryan and Kory from the Octobot's tentacles in car form. The twins call Nathan, Officer Oh and Dr. Noh for help, but no one picks up the call.

24.SummaryEnglish: There is now a Food by Fuse restaurant on practically every corner of Daedo City, and the food is becoming more and more popular with kids. Dolly starts noticing that her classmates have grown restless, and have started shaking their legs in class. Sensing something is awry, Dolly decides to investigate with her journalist partner, Layla.

25.SummaryEnglish: Dr. Noh is recovering from the exhausting process of putting out the Daedo City warehouse fire. The Tobot team worry that they will be defenseless against more fires without the help of Dr. Noh and Tobot R. Kory suggests that they find a spare pilot to cover for Dr. Noh for when R is repaired.

26.SummaryEnglish: Many of the same kids who had shaky legs have now begun sleep-walking around Daedo City, and more suspicions arise about the possible relationship between their behaviour and Food by Fuse. It turns out Acnee's impersonator is none other than Diluk, who is somehow able to perfectly imitate her voice.

27.SummaryEnglish: Neon believes that he must be harsher in his dealings with the team members and becomes very strict. Perhaps the change was too abrupt for his members, as they all complain. Meanwhile, Tom Fuse assesses Mr. Holmes's progress in disguising the Raptorbot assembly lines at the Food by Fuse factory.

28.SummaryEnglish: Shaken by all the public suspicion surrounding Food by Fuse, Tom hastens to open his public factory tours to prove to the public that he has "nothing to hide." Of course, he has now disguised and locked down the sectors of the factory where he is producing Raptorbots and designing other anti-Tobot technology.

29.SummaryEnglish: Team Quatran enters the Food by Fuse factory first, in search of Layla. Just as they get their bearings, they're suddenly attacked by Tom Fuse's robotic assembly machines.

30.SummaryEnglish: The Tobots, trapped by Tom Fuse at his factory, are awaiting their doom, as the pilots are forced to look on with dread. All hope seems lost, until Tobot R comes to their rescue, just in time! Tom Fuse is amused by the dramatic appearance of another Tobot, and prepares his Centipede for a final attack.

1.SummaryEnglish: Limo gives Tobot Z an exciting new upgrade called "Adventure Z." However, before Dylan gets a chance to test out Z's new moves, the boys are called out on an emergency mission to Daedo City.

22.SummaryEnglish: Officer Oh warns Limo that the train has changed directions and is making it's way back, full steam. Limo hurries to place the Mind Cores back in the Tobots, but he's working in the dark. Officer Oh panics as she witnesses the train transform into a terrifying villainous robot.
